(Simplified: 笕)
Chinese Definition:
①連接起來引水用的長竹管：“(錢塘湖)北有石函，南有筧”。
②橫安在屋檐上承接雨水的長竹管：水筧。

筧字的基本解释

筧
jiǎn
见“笕”。

筧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiǎn］
［《廣韻》古典切，上銑，見。］
“笕1”的繁体字。
用对剖并内节贯通的毛竹连续衔接而成的引水管道。

筧字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　筧； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页885第12
【廣韻】古典切【集韻】吉典切，?音繭。以竹通水也。【白居易·石函記】錢塘湖北有石函，南有筧，放水漑田，若諸小筧，非灌田時，?須封閉築塞。其筧之南，舊有闕岸，若水暴漲於石函，南筧洩之，隄防潰也。　又【類篇】胡典切【篇海】讀如現。竹名。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiǎn］
["Guangyun" classical cut, milling, see. ]
"笕1" in traditional characters.
The water diversion pipeline is formed by continuous connection of bamboos which are cut and penetrated by the inner section.
Jian
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo Character Department] 　笕; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 885 No. 12
[Guang Yun] Classical Cut [Ji Yun] Ji Dian cut, sound cocoon. Water is also connected to bamboo. [Bai Juyi·Stone Letter] There is a stone letter in Qiantang Hubei, and a bamboo in the south, and water is used to regain the fields. In the south of the Jian, there was an old bank. If the water soars above the Shihan, the Nan Jian will vent, and the embankment will collapse.　[Classes] Hu Dianqie [Pianhai] Read as it is now. Bamboo name.
